description.english: Complete all levels of the island "Darkwoods"
description.french: Terminez tous les niveaux de l'île "Darkwoods".

description.italian: Completa tutti i livelli dell'isola "Darkwoods
description.portuguese: Completar todos os níveis da ilha "Darkwoods
description.spanish: Completa todos los niveles de la isla "Darkwoods".

description.english: Complete all levels of the island "Eternal Ice".
description.french: Terminez tous les niveaux de l'île de la glace éternelle.

description.english: Complete all levels of the island "Lava Desert".

description.russian: Заполните все уровни на острове пустыни Лава.

description.english: Complete all three islands

description.english: Complete a level without any deaths.
